Introduction
This topic contains information on SC for disabilities resulting from exposure to other specific environmental hazards, including
presumptive SC based on exposure to contaminated water supply on the Marine Corps Base at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina
service at Camp Lejeune
presumptive disabilities associated with exposure to contaminants in the Camp Lejeune water supply
Camp Lejeune effective date considerations
considering
claims for disabilities not recognized under 38 CFR 3.309(f)
, and
Camp Lejeune claims from former National Guard or Reserve members
, and
rating requirements for Camp Lejeune claims
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section B - Rating Claims Based on Exposure to Contaminants in the Water Supply at Camp Lejeune
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section B
